UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information.

photoURL.description: Data URL for the user's profile picture. Can be a very long string.

bannerURL.description: Data URL for the user's profile banner. Can be a very long string.

state.description: The state of the user account (e.g., 'user', 'admin').

Hunt.title: Shiny Hunt
Hunt.description: Represents a single shiny hunting session.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this hunt.

pokemonName.description: The name of the Pokémon being hunted.

game.description: The game the hunt is taking place in.

odds.description: The shiny odds for this hunt (e.g., 4096).

shinyCharm.description: Whether the shiny charm is being used.

encounters.description: The number of encounters in this hunt.

timeElapsed.description: The total time elapsed in seconds.

isActive.description: Whether the hunt timer is currently active.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the hunt was created.

Pokemon.title: User Pokemon
Pokemon.description: Represents a single Pokémon caught by a user.

caughtAt.description: Timestamp of when the pokemon was caught.

Follow.title: Follow Relationship
Follow.description: Indicates that one user is following another.

followedAt.description: Timestamp of when the follow action occurred.

ChangelogPost.title: Changelog Post
ChangelogPost.description: A single entry in the site's changelog.

userDisplayName.description: The display name of the author at time of posting.

userPhotoURL.description: The profile picture of the author at time of posting.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the post was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for each user.

/users/{userId}/hunts/{huntId}.description: Stores the shiny hunts for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/pokemon/{pokemonId}.description: Stores the Pokémon collection for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/following/{followedUserI.description: A list of users that {userId} is following. The document ID is the UID of the user being followed.

/changelog/{postId}.description: Stores all changelog posts for the website.
